programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubares, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de completos estranhos se v isolado por um louco rico em seu complexo na ilha. Eles so forados a uma luva horripilante, onde devem sobreviver a uma barragem de espcies cada vez mais mortais de tubaro.

programme.title: Fuga do Vulco, (2014, Supernatural Sci-Fi)
programme.desc: Quando um avio comercial fica preso dentro de um crculo de vulces em erupo, os passageiros e a tripulao precisam encontrar uma maneira de sobreviver - sem aterrissar.

programme.title: O ltimo Refgio, (2021, Action)

programme.title: Anjos da Noite, (2020, Thriller)

programme.title: Piranha 2, (2012, Horror)

programme.title: Vulco - O Apocalipse, (2014, Supernatural Sci-Fi)

programme.title: O Lado Oculto da Lua, (2022, Action)

programme.title: A Fuga, (1994, Action)

programme.title: Retroceder Nunca, Render-se Jamais, (1986, Action)

programme.title: Mscara Negra, (1996, Action)

programme.title: O Preo da Traio, (1996, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher chamada Allison Pond encontrada morta no deserto perto de Los Angeles.Um detetive investiga o caso e descobre que ela poderia estar ligada a um programa militar secreto.Porm, ele tambm guarda segredos: ela era sua amante.

programme.title: Camp (Lio de Vida), (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: Aps se inscrever em um programa de monitores de um acampamento filantrpico de vero, um consultor de investimentos tenta ajudar um menino de dez anos de idade a entender o significado do amor incondicional.

programme.title: ltimos Dias no Deserto, (2015, Drama)

programme.title: Um Anjo em Nossas Vidas, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Quando um criminoso insensvel e doente cruza o caminho de uma menina cheia de f, uma segunda chance surge para tocar o corao durante a temporada de festas.

programme.title: Prova de Fogo, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: No trabalho o Capito Caleb vive pelo velho ditado dos bombeiros: Nunca deixe o seu companheiro para trs. Em casa, ele vive pelas prprias regras. Agora Caleb ter o seu trabalho mais rduo, resgatar o corao de sua esposa.

programme.title: Carta Para Deus, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: Um menino que luta contra o cncer escreve cartas para Deus, tocando vidas em sua vizinhana e inspirando esperana entre todos com quem entra em contato.

programme.title: A Guerra de Anna, (2019, Drama)
programme.desc: Uma menina de seis anos chamada Anna tem toda a famlia assassinada em uma execuo em massa de judeus. Por um milagre, ela sobrevive e passa as prximas centenas de dias escondida na chamin em desuso de um comandante nazista.

programme.title: The Music of Silence, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Um filme biogrfico sobre o tenor e msico italiano Andrea Bocelli. Apesar de ter nascido com um grave problema de viso que terminar em cegueira, Bocelli supera todos os tipos de obstculos, guiado por grandes ambies em relao sua paixo, a msica.

programme.title: Grandes Olhos, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Pintora e defensora das causas feministas, a norte-americana Margaret Keane enfrenta um de seus maiores desafios ao levar ao tribunal o prprio marido. Em um perodo em que o reconhecimento de um trabalho feminino era difcil.

programme.title: Abrao, (1993, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Deus decide fazer uma nova promessa humanidade depois das calamidades que culminaram no desastre da Torre de Babel. Abrao escolhido para torna-se o Pai das Naes e a histria da redeno se inicia.

programme.desc: Aps a morte do pai, dois irmos se renem para o funeral e acabam encontrando uma caverna misteriosa prxima do local do enterro. Enquanto explorando-a, eles so forados a enfrentar o passado, tanto deles, quanto do prprio pai.

programme.title: A Colheita, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Para escapar de seus problemas conjugais, uma jovem famlia viaja da cidade para passar o vero em um vilarejo Amish, que est tomado por uma presena malvola. Os visitantes logo descobrem que foram trazidos para l por uma razo.

programme.title: Megalodon, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Um navio militar americano com tripulantes experientes est no encalo de um submarino no identificado. Ao encontr-lo, descobrem que uma nave russa, cujos marinheiros dizem ter sido atacados por um tubaro gigante e voraz.

programme.title: O Dom da Premonio, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Viva com o dom da premonio resolve ler a sorte dos moradores da cidade para sustentar os filhos, o que lhe rende a desconfiana dos mais conservadores. Para complicar, ocorre um assassinato cuja soluo depende de sua clarividncia.

programme.title: Pessoa Sombria, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Os recm-casados Megan e Andrew acabaram de se mudar para a casa dos sonhos com aspiraes de comear uma famlia. No entanto, eventos estranhos comeam a acontecer.

programme.title: A Possesso de Mary, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Uma famlia navegando em guas isoladas descobre que o navio que eles compraram guarda segredos terrveis. Eventos aterrorizantes comeam a assombr-los, fazendo cada um deles questionar a prpria sanidade.

programme.title: A Maldio de Raven's Hollow, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Cinco cadetes da Academia Militar Americana de West Point, incluindo Edgar Allan Poe, participam de um treinamento no interior do estado de Nova York. O grupo se depara com um homem estripado vestido de espantalho e um mistrio assustador se inicia.

programme.title: Pnico na Neve, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Trs esquiadores ficam presos em um telefrico antes de sua ltima descida. Quando a equipe da estao de esqui desliga as luzes da pista, o trio percebe que foi esquecido e entra em pnico, sendo forados a tomar medidas extremas para sobreviver.

programme.title: A Colnia, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A era glacial fora um grupo de sobreviventes a viver em um mundo subterrneo, e agora eles devem lutar para preservar a humanidade contra algo mais selvagem do que a natureza.

programme.title: A rvore da Vida, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Histria de uma tpica famlia americana dos anos 50, formada por um casal e trs filhos. A rgida educao, o ambiente e o passado ainda permeiam a vida de Jack, o filho mais velho, que na vida adulta tenta se reconciliar com o pai.

programme.title: E Agora? A Mame Saiu de Frias!, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Giulia, me de trs crianas eltricas, decide ir viajar sem a famlia por dez dias, e o caos da casa sobra para Carlo, marido e pai que vive apenas para o trabalho. Perdido e com um problema nas mos, ele tem que se virar para dar conta.

programme.title: Vivendo no Limite, (1970, Drama)

programme.title: Colossal, (1970, Drama)

programme.title: Acima das Nuvens, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: H 20 anos, Maria ficou famosa por sua interpretao no teatro. Agora, ela tem que enfrentar o fato de que uma jovem estrela de Hollywood ir interpretar o mesmo papel. Alm disso, ela convidada a dividir o palco com a novata, mas em outro papel.

programme.title: O Monge Prova de Balas, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: H 60 anos um monge tibetano protege um pergaminho que tem a chave para o poder ilimitado. Prestes a se aposentar, precisa de um substituto, e o principal candidato Kar, um malandro que acaba por salvar o monge de bandidos atrs do pergaminho.

programme.desc: Aps passar 12 anos na priso, o famoso arrombador de cofres Dom Hemingway volta para as ruas de Londres em busca da sua recompensa por ter ficado de boca fechada durante todo esse tempo. Ao lado do amigo Dickie, ele faz uma visita ao chefe do crime.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao
programme.desc: Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Ponte Tenchi
programme.desc: Os ninjas tentam salvar Kankuro. Vov Chiyo, perita em veneno, chamada. Uma tempestade de areia atrasa Naruto, Sakura e Kakashi. Tsunade se preocupa e envia Guy e sua equipe. O akatsuki e Gaara comeam o jutsu de selamento e os nove drages fantasmas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta
programme.desc: Sakura trata Kankuro, deixando todos espantados com suas mos firmes. Vov Chiyo fica emocionada por Tsunade ter enviado sua prpria aprendiz e pela determinao de Sakura. Kankuro fornece informaes sobre os Akatsuki. Kakashi envia um co de caa ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia
programme.desc: Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos Akatsuki. Temari recebe ordens para ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vov Chiyo se oferece para ficar no lugar de Temari. Naruto e Sakura ficam chocados com a histria das bestas de cauda.
programme.sub-title: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe comeam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lana um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura
programme.desc: Guy se arrepende ao ver seus trs alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxignio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi comea um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio
programme.desc: Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguio recomea, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto tambm um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara engolfado por uma luz branca.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltrao: O Covil Da Cobra!
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma viso chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cpias idnticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vov Chiyo e Sakura no faam nada precipitado.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante...
programme.desc: A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro?

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro
programme.desc: Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha
programme.desc: Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo
programme.desc: Sakura revida o ataque da areia de ferro. Ela rapidamente comea a ler os padres de ataque do Sasori, que se prepara para usar seu chakra. O ataque da areia de ferro penetra o espao, Sakura atingida na mo e infectada pelo veneno!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento
programme.desc: Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe Guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta de Sakura e Vov Chiyo enquanto enfrentam suas cpias, que permanecem firmes! Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparao para a nova tcnica de Kakashi est em andamento!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar Naruto com Vov Chiyo, sofrendo envenenada. Kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan, um poderoso jutsu que transporta tudo o que o olho pode ver para outra dimenso. Naruto finalmente consegue salvar Gaara, mas fica enfurecido ...

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde o controle e o esprito da Raposa de Nove Caudas assume o comando. Kakashi consegue suprimir a Raposa de Nove Caudas. Deidara descobre a derrota de Sasori. A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitao em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e tambm por uma multido de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trs do jutsu de ressuscitao, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato
programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe!
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis
programme.desc: Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontraro de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto no deve ser enviado em misses envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade no concorda, ento eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido
programme.desc: A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direo ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passaro a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relaes entre os membros de sua equipe.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto encontra Sasuke, seu professor, que voltou para a aldeia aps um longo perodo ausente.
programme.sub-title: Tticas para se dar bem com a sua filha

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Com medo de atrapalhar as misses, Namida decide parar de chorar para evitar que seu jutsu seja ativado acidentalmente.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Buscando melhorar a reputao do Cl Nara, um ancio do cl diz para Shikadai desistir de se tornar um ninja e virar um poltico.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Pssaros esto atacando os residentes de uma aldeia nos arredores Pas do Fogo. As equipes de Boruto e Sumire recebem uma misso em conjunto de identificar a causa dos ataques.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Seguindo as informaes dos aldees, Boruto e Sarada vo ao encontro de Jugo. No entanto, ao chegarem no local, o encontram transformado em um monstro feroz e sofrendo com os efeitos da Marca da Maldio.
programme.sub-title: Jugo e a Marca da Maldio

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Seguindo as ordens de Konohamaru, Sumire e o resto da Equipe 15 voltam para relatar a situao, mas no caminho so atacados por um inimigo misterioso.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sumire consegue fugir com a ajuda de Nue e sai em busca de Wasabi e Namida quando, de repente, Jugo, Suigetsu e Karin aparecem.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sarada e Karin tm dificuldades para lutar contra um inimigo que tem o poder de manipular livremente a Marca da Maldio.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e Suigetsu querem ajudar Jugo, mas no conseguem por conta dos sedativos que receberam. Enquanto isso, os pssaros com a Marca da Maldio comeam a se juntar e migrar!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A Equipe 7 enviada em uma misso para ajudar a capturar um ladro de joias, mas acaba perdendo o rastro dele.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mitsuki se sente mal e decide passar no centro de pesquisa de Orochimaru. Mitsuki explica a Orochimaru que nunca teve sonhos enquanto dormia, mas que recentemente passou a sonhar.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai Sarutobi, prima de Konohamaru, incumbida de escoltar Kakashi, o Sexto Hokage, e seu amigo Might Guy at as fontes termais.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: A misso de ranque S!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai e companhia chegam nas fontes termais na fronteira do Pas do Fogo com o Pas do Vapor, mas Mirai, que est sempre focada no trabalho, no consegue relaxar!
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: A guerra de ces e gatos!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Aps alguns dias de misso, Mirai vai nas fontes termais com Tenten, uma ex-aluna de Guy, mas o momento relaxante interrompido quando Guy grita que viu um fantasma.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: O hotel amaldioado!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai, Kakashi e Guy viajam com Tatsumi para uma aldeia com uma fonte termal secreta, mas descobrem que a fonte foi tapada com uma pedra!
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: Batatinhas e a pedra gigante!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Comovida com os esforos de Tatsumi para cumprir seu objetivo sozinha, Mirai decide dar uma pausa em sua misso e ajud-la.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: guas termais da ressurreio!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Mirai sai do hotel com Tatsumi sem falar nada para Kakashi e Guy. Nas fontes termais, Mirai acredita ver Asuma, seu pai, mas h alguma coisa estranha.
programme.sub-title: O pergaminho dos ninjas do vapor: O rei da Mirai!

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Naruto e Shikamaru debatem sobre o que fazer com os participantes da Prova Chunin que no puderam concluir devido ao ataque dos Otsutsuki. Sasuke retorna e busca por pistas do Cl Otsutsuki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Com Shikadai como capito, Boruto, Iwabe e Wasabi formam uma equipe especial e saem em busca de uma flor rara que floresce por pouco tempo.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e seus amigos se tornam vidos colecionadores das Cartas Ninja Extremas, mas percebem que ainda no tm a carta de Shino Aburame, seu professor, nem de Rock Lee, o pai de Metal!

programme.desc: Determined to prove his innocence in a double-cross, Bob Lee Swagger is now in a high-tension race from every law enforcement agency in the US and a shadowy organization that wants him dead.

programme.desc: Jotaro and his comrades are attacked by Polnareff, an assassin with a Stand called "Silver Chariot" that is capable of lightning-fast swordplay. It falls to Avdol to face down the threat using "Magician's Red."

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Dark Blue Moon
programme.desc: Jotaro welcomes a new member to the team and the group leaves for Singapore by ship. Along the way, a young stowaway is found and Jotaro comes under attack, but is the child the source of this latest evil?

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Strength
programme.desc: Jotaros group is rescued when they spot a giant cargo ship, but they soon find that the only occupant is a strange orangutan. Curious, they begin to explore the ship and solve its mysteries.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Jotaro and his companions finally make it to a hotel in Singapore, but soon Polnareff falls into a trap set by a dangerous and brutal enemy.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yellow Temperance
programme.desc: Joseph uses his Stand to generate a spirit message from a TV, only to receive a warning claiming that Kakyoin is a traitor. Meanwhile, Jotaro, Ann and Kakyoin are out exploring Singapore when Kakyoin begins acting strangely.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: The Joestars' group arrives in India, where Polnareff is attacked by a Stand only visible through a mirror. As terrifying as it is, the Stand could also be related to his sister's murder.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Emperor and the Hanged Man Part 2
programme.desc: When Avdol is struck down defending Polnareff, the Frenchman goes into a state of shock, leaving him vulnerable. That is when "Hanged Man," Centerfold's Stand, begins its most furious attack.
programme.sub-title: The Emperor and the Hanged Man Part 2

programme.desc: Jotaro and the others next head toward Varanasi. On their way there, Joseph realizes his arm is quite swollen. At first, it doesn't bother him much, but the bigger it gets, the creepier it looks.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Jotaro and his group head toward Pakistan by car. Polnareff is behind the wheel on a dangerous mountain road when a mysterious vehicle starts impeding their progress.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Justice Part 1
programme.desc: After surviving another attack, Jotaro and his team make it to Pakistan, where they stop at an inn to rest. The village around the inn, however, is quiet, and its inhabitants rather odd.

programme.desc: The match between Hisoka and Kastro is about to begin.

programme.desc: Gon decides to listen to the tape finds inside the box.

programme.desc: Kurapika is determined to retrieve the eyes of his brethren and send the Phantom Troupe to the deepest depths of hell.

programme.title: Best Men, (1999, Comedy)

programme.desc: Dismissed some time ago from the FBI, Mark Kaminsky is contacted by his old boss, Shannon, whose son has been murdered. Shannon needs Kaminsky's help and offers to re-instate him if he is successful.

programme.title: No Way Out, (1987, Action)

programme.title: The Time Machine, (2002, Science fiction)

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events, (2004, Action)

programme.title: The Boondock Saints, (1999, Thriller)

programme.title: Original Gangstas, (1996, Action)

programme.title: Shottas, (2002, Action)

programme.title: Suicide Kings, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: A group of youngsters kidnap a respected Mafia figure.

programme.desc: When the matriarch of the Graham family passes away, her daughter (Toni Collette) and grandchildren begin to unravel cryptic and increasingly terrifying secrets about their ancestry, trying to outrun the sinister fate they have inherited.

programme.title: Species II, (1998, Sci-Fi Horror)

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #10 Tokyo Crisis
programme.desc: When Lupin and his bandit buddies attempt to steal a set of historically significant photographic plates, it turns out they're not the only ones with eyes on the prize in this thievish tale of mayhem and millionaires.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #11 The Columbus Files
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are after the mysterious treasure known only as Columbus' Egg. Fujiko was able to memorize the Egg's location, but when she's attacked and loses her memory, all seems lost. No one else knows where it is. What's a thief to do?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #12 Missed by a Dollar
programme.desc: At an auction in New York, attendees are shocked when a mysterious man bids $1,000,000 on a plain diamond ring. The man himself is even more astounded when the President of the World Bank outbids him by a single dollar. The man is Lupin!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #14 Episode 0: The First Contact
programme.desc: The stickup that started it all! Lupin and Fujiko are both after an ancient artifact Jigen is supposed to protect, while Goemon happens to be searching for his clan's lost treasure nearby. Of course, Inspector Zenigata isn't far behind.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #20: Sweet Lost Night
programme.desc: Turns out the Magic Lamp is real, and Lupin's found a way to steal it! But this genie has a price: to grant his wish, she demands half his memories.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #6 Dragon of Doom
programme.desc: On the bottom of the ocean, within the sunken Titanic, the golden dragon statue waits. When Lupin and the gang are hired to retrieve it, Goemon recognizes the dragon as one of his clan's treasures. Now, he's ready to fight his own friends to protect it!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
programme.desc: To retrieve the Harimao's Treasure, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #8 The Secret of Twilight Gemini
programme.desc: As Lupin's mentor Don Dolune lies on his deathbed, he hands the master thief a gift: the diamond named Twilight. But it's only half of the treasure-the other half of the Twilight can be found in Morocco

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #9 Islands of Assasins

programme.title: Heartland - The Silent Partner
programme.desc: A client reveals that Peter turned down a job offer, leaving Amy in a difficult position.

programme.title: Heartland - Broken Heartland
programme.desc: Amy is invited to do a horse clinic in Montana, so she and Ty decide to take a road trip.

programme.title: Heartland - Cowgirls Dont Cry
programme.desc: Tim has a problem student at his new rodeo school; reluctant Amy is forced into wedding planning with Lisa.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Love and Marriage
programme.desc: Jonathan helps members of a feuding family to see what life would have been like without their loved ones.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Love and Marriage
programme.desc: Before marrying her fiance Brad, Mark gives his friend a lesson about marriage that he hopes she will hold dear to her heart.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Code Name: Freak
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark head to college; Jonathan helps a 12-year-old genius and Mark takes care of a rowdy dorm.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - The Odyssey
programme.desc: Laura and Albert leave home to help a terminally ill boy realize his dream of seeing the ocean before he dies.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - Back to School
programme.desc: Laura tries to convince Almanzo she is mature and her love for him is not just infatuation.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - Back to School
programme.desc: Laura wants to pass the teaching exam to prove her maturity, but romantic rival Nellie has other ideas.

programme.title: Heartland - Riders on the Storm
programme.desc: With the help of Amy and Ty, Scotts nephew comes to the realization that hes worthy of continuing the family tradition of relay racing.

programme.title: Heartland - Eclipse of the Heart
programme.desc: Upon her return from Vancouver, Lou makes an announcement that could forever change the Heartland family.

programme.title: Heartland - Faking It
programme.desc: After Georgie receives devastating news from Lou and Peter, the family attempts to support her.

programme.title: The Love Letter
programme.desc: A letter in an antique desk inspires a 1990s man (Campbell Scott) to correspond with its author, a woman (Jennifer Jason Leigh) from the 1800s.

programme.title: Summer in the City
programme.desc: After landing a big promotion managing a store in Manhattan, a woman from a small Midwestern town tries to adopt a big city personality, which leads to disastrous results.

programme.title: Fashionably Yours
programme.desc: After three years of organizing fashion collections at a top magazine, Lauren is passed up for a promotion and decides it is finally time to throw in the towel and move home.

programme.title: In the Key of Love
programme.desc: A woman abandons her promising singing career to run her grandmothers wedding photography business. Just as shes beginning to forget about her former life, her ex-boyfriend walks back into the picture.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - The Show Must Go On
programme.desc: Rosemarys play gets a new venue and a new cast; Elizabeth takes her curriculum to the airwaves; Faith helps a friend make a decision; Lucas faces unexpected opposition.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - Buried Treasure
programme.desc: The Garrison Gang comes for their gold with Hope Valley residents in the crosshairs; Angela visits the Schwartzman School and Rosemary uncovers the truth about Ava.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - Through the Valley
programme.desc: The land dispute around McGintys Meadow intensifies; Hickam and Mei throw a harvest festival for the town; Elizabeth helps Emily find her purpose.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - Having Faith
programme.desc: When Little Jack falls ill, Elizabeth and Nathan care for him together as Hickam and Mei race to secure medicine; the kids broadcast a baseball game over the radio to lift spirits.

programme.title: Heartland - Riders on the Storm
programme.desc: With the help of Amy and Ty, Scotts nephew comes to the realization that hes worthy of continuing the family tradition of relay racing.

programme.title: Heartland - Faking It

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Man to Man
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help a dying tycoon to reconnect with his only son; they decide it their mission to help the family reconcile their differences before it is too late.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Jonathan Smith Goes to Washington
programme.desc: A U.S. senator opposes Jonathan and Marks efforts to pass legislation that could save a little girls life.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Oh Lucky Man
programme.desc: Mark and Jonathan become the target of con artists after Mark wins five million dollars.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - The Family Tree
programme.desc: The Ingalls go to court to adopt Albert, but his father reappears and demands custody.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - The Third Miracle
programme.desc: Mary must get help when a stagecoach accident traps Adam and endangers a pregnant woman; Laura and Albert offer a beehive to their rivals.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - Annabelle
programme.desc: Laura becomes jealous when Almanzo dates another girl; Mr. Oleson learns that the fat lady in a visiting circus is his sister.

programme.title: Heartland - All I Need Is You
programme.desc: Lou takes charge of the preparations for the big day; in an attempt to avoid the craziness, Amy tries to domesticate a rescued horse.

programme.title: Heartland - Written in Stone
programme.desc: Lou deals with last minute obstacles in an attempt to give Amy and Ty the perfect wedding.

programme.title: Heartland - Brave New World
programme.desc: A bear lurks near Heartland; Amy and Georgie rescue an injured horse.

programme.title: How to Fall in Love
programme.desc: A socially awkward accountant (Eric Mabius) receives dating tips from his high-school crush (Brooke DOrsay).

programme.title: Second Honeymoon
programme.desc: The children of a couple (Roma Downey, Tim Matheson) on the brink of divorce send their parents on a trip in hopes of rekindling the romance.

programme.title: Remember Sunday
programme.desc: Suffering from short-term memory loss, a man (Zachary Levi) falls in love with the same waitress (Alexis Bledel) every day.

programme.title: Campfire Kiss
programme.desc: A single mother takes her son camping. Soon after she arrives, she starts to butt heads with her cabin neighbor, a single father and outdoors man, who is also in search of a connection with his teen daughter.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - Must Be Gold
programme.desc: As graduation approaches, Elizabeth and Nathan plan for a happy summer together; Lucas and Edie race Rosemary and Bill to find the gold; the town plans a sweet surprise for Minnie.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - Lost and Found
programme.desc: Constable Jack Thornton tries to discover a planks rightful owner after it is discovered in the mine; Elizabeth tries to capture the enthusiasm of her students in the wake of tragedy.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - Cease and Desist
programme.desc: Elizabeth comes up with a plan to keep the widows from moving out of town; they receive an eviction notice from the Coal Company to make way for new miner recruits.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart - A Telling Silence
programme.desc: Elizabeth assists a mute student who is having a difficult time coping with the death of her father; Jack looks into the mysterious circumstances surrounding the burning of Coal Valleys only church.

programme.title: Heartland - All I Need Is You
programme.desc: Lou takes charge of the preparations for the big day; in an attempt to avoid the craziness, Amy tries to domesticate a rescued horse.

programme.title: Heartland - Brave New World
programme.desc: A bear lurks near Heartland; Amy and Georgie rescue an injured horse.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Basingers New York
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help a cynical newspaper columnist find the Christmas spirit when he cant come up with a story on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - All That Glitters
programme.desc: A small-time crook finds a briefcase containing $1 million and then needs help fending off the two hoods who lost the money.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Wally
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark are assigned to reward the good deeds of a homeless street performer.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - The Preacher Takes a Wife
programme.desc: Mrs. Oleson demands the Rev. Aldens resignation when she discovers a woman parishioner spent the night in his room.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - The Halloween Dream
programme.desc: Albert dreams that he and Laura have been captured by Indians who want him to lead an attack against the U.S. Army.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - The Return of Mr. Edwards
programme.desc: Charles and Laura rush to the aid of an old friend when they learn that a disabling accident has destroyed his will to live.

programme.title: Heartland - Begin Again
programme.desc: Ty prepares to celebrate a milestone; Ty and Amy treat an abandoned horse.

programme.title: Heartland - Riding For a Fall
programme.desc: Georgie gets help performing a trick for the rodeo from Amy, but gets pulled away by Lou and Peter who insist she must focus on her schoolwork.

programme.title: Heartland - Ties of the Earth
programme.desc: Jack struggles with the imminent loss of a friend.

programme.title: Anne Tylers Saint Maybe
programme.desc: Suspicious of his brothers new bride (Mary-Louise Parker), a young man (Thomas McCarthy) meddles in their lives.

programme.title: A Painted House
programme.desc: Members (Scott Glenn, Arija Bareikis, Robert Sean Leonard) of an extended family of cotton farmers deal with hardships in 1950s Arkansas.

programme.title: In From the Night
programme.desc: A writer (Marcia Gay Harden) forms a compassionate bond with her nephew (Taylor Handley) after the troubled teen runs away from his parents.

programme.title: Fairfield Road
programme.desc: A man (Jesse Metcalfe) finds sanctuary in Cape Cod after losing his job and his girlfriend.

programme.title: On the 12th Date of Christmas
programme.desc: Two seemingly incompatible game designers in Chicago team up to create a romantic city-wide scavenger hunt to promote a hotel chain.

programme.title: A Bride for Christmas
programme.desc: Aiden (Andrew Walker) bets his friends that he can convince a woman to marry him by Christmas, and he sets his sights on Jessie (Arielle Kebbel), a young woman who has sworn off serious relationships.

programme.title: Heartland - Begin Again
programme.desc: Ty prepares to celebrate a milestone; Ty and Amy treat an abandoned horse.

programme.title: Heartland - Riding For a Fall

programme.title: Heartland - Ties of the Earth
programme.desc: Jack struggles with the imminent loss of a friend.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Song of Songs
programme.desc: After suffering a heart attack, a blind pianist turns to Mark and Jonathan to help him start a new life.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - Night to Remember
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark, posing as high-school teachers, help a diverse group of students deal with the trauma of the upcoming senior prom.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven - A Mother and a Daughter
programme.desc: Fearing success may end Jonathans stay on Earth, Mark hampers efforts to reconcile a mother and daughter.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie - The Little House Years
programme.desc: Gathered for a holiday, the Ingalls tell Albert how they came to Walnut Grove.

programme.title: Hotel Rwanda (2004)
programme.desc: Hutu Paul Rusesabagina saves more than 1,200 Tutsi refugees from genocide by hiding them at his posh hotel in Rwandas capital city.

programme.title: Challengers (2024)
programme.desc: Tensions run high when a grand slam tennis champion finds himself standing across the net from the once-promising, now burnt-out Patrick, his former best friend and his wifes former boyfriend.

programme.title: Fences (2016)
programme.desc: Now working as a garbage collector in 1950s Pittsburgh, a former baseball star (Denzel Washington) creates tension in his family when he squashes his sons (Jovan Adepo) chance to meet a college football recruiter.

programme.title: The Deer Hunter (1978)
programme.desc: The horrors of Vietnam affect three Pennsylvania steelworkers (Robert De Niro, Christopher Walken, John Savage), lifelong friends who serve together.

programme.title: The Hillside Strangler
programme.sub-title: City of Dreams, City of Nightmares
programme.desc: Ten women are slain, their bodies dumped across the iconic hillsides of Los Angeles; activists demand justice as the media turns murder into spectacle; detectives Frank Salerno and Pete Finnigan race to stop the killer before he strikes again.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: Comic Daniel Webb gives his unique take on being an empowered gay man in the heart of Texas.

programme.title: Harts War (2002)
programme.desc: A conniving colonel (Bruce Willis) oversees the murder trial of a black airman (Terrence Howard) in a Nazi prisoner-of-war camp.

programme.title: IF (2024)
programme.desc: After discovering she can see everyones imaginary friends, a girl embarks on a magical adventure to reconnect forgotten IFs with their kids.

programme.title: Runaway Train (1985)
programme.desc: Escaped convicts (Jon Voight, Eric Roberts) and a stowaway girl (Rebecca De Mornay) ride an unmanned diesel speeding out of control through Alaska.

programme.title: Madeas Big Happy Family (2011)
programme.desc: Madea gathers the clan together to help her niece cope with some distressing news about her health.

programme.title: Boo! A Madea Halloween (2016)
programme.desc: Cranky, fast-talking Madea (Tyler Perry) finds herself under attack from ghosts, ghouls and zombies after breaking up a fraternitys Halloween party.

programme.title: Madeas Witness Protection (2012)
programme.desc: Placed under federal protection in Madeas Southern home, a Wall Street banker and his dysfunctional family get a taste of the no-nonsense matriarchs special brand of tough love.

programme.title: Barbershop (2002)
programme.desc: The owner of a popular barbershop considers selling the place to a loan shark who wants to convert it into a strip club.

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back in Business (2004)
programme.desc: The owner of a barbershop faces pressure from a corporation that is opening establishments in his neighborhood.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days (2003)
programme.sub-title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days (2003)
programme.desc: A columnist (Kate Hudson) tries to make a man (Matthew McConaughey) dump her, but he bets his boss that she will fall in love.

programme.title: The Fighting Temptations (2003)
programme.desc: To collect his aunts inheritance, an unemployed man (Cuba Gooding Jr.) must form a gospel choir and lead it to success.

programme.title: The Purple Rose of Cairo (1985)
programme.desc: A 1930s movie star (Jeff Daniels) steps off the screen to join a waitress (Mia Farrow) in the audience.

programme.title: LaRoy, Texas (2023)
programme.desc: Mistaken for a low-rent hit man, Ray decides to play the part of a hired gun. However, when the supposedly simple plan begins to unravel, he recruits a private investigator to help him escape from the actual killer and make it out alive.

programme.title: Torn Hearts (2022)
programme.desc: A country music duo seek out the private mansion of their idol and end up in a twisted series of horrors that force them to confront the limits theyd go for their dreams.

programme.title: The Great Escape (1963)
programme.desc: A group of Allied soldiers are intent on breaking out, not only to escape, but also to draw Nazi forces away from battle to search for fugitives. Among the prisoners are American Captain Virgil Hilts and British Squadron Leader Roger Bartlett.

programme.title: Blame It on Rio (1983)
programme.desc: A middle-aged coffee broker (Michael Caine) eyes his partners (Joseph Bologna) nubile teenage daughter (Michelle Johnson) on vacation in Brazil.

programme.title: At Close Range (1986)
programme.desc: A rural teen (Sean Penn) joins his fathers (Christopher Walken) crime clan and winds up running for his life with his girlfriend (Mary Stuart Masterson).

programme.title: Dressed to Kill (1980)
programme.desc: A psychiatrist (Michael Caine), a prostitute (Nancy Allen) and the son of a slain woman (Angie Dickinson) seek a Manhattan slasher.

programme.title: A Simple Plan (1998)
programme.desc: A Minnesotan (Bill Paxton), his dimwitted brother (Billy Bob Thornton) and his brothers redneck friend (Brent Briscoe) find and decide to keep $4 million.

programme.title: Hoodlum (1997)
programme.desc: Mobster Ellsworth "Bumpy" Johnson (Laurence Fishburne) vies with rival Dutch Schultz (Tim Roth) for control of illegal gambling in 1930s Harlem.

programme.title: Donnie Brasco (1997)
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent (Johnny Depp) uses the patronage of an unwitting mobster (Al Pacino) to infiltrate the New York Mafia.

programme.title: A Time to Kill (1996)
programme.desc: A Southern lawyer and his legal assistant defend a black man for killing his young daughters white attackers.

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: A law-school grad uncovers a sinister secret about the Tennessee firm that made him an offer he couldnt refuse.

programme.title: Blue Velvet (1986)
programme.desc: A young man (Kyle MacLachlan) ties the mystery of a severed ear to a roadhouse floozy (Isabella Rossellini) and her tormentor (Dennis Hopper).

programme.title: The Hillside Strangler
programme.sub-title: City of Dreams, City of Nightmares

programme.title: Alive (2019)
programme.desc: Following the conflicts in Iraq and Afghanistan, injured veterans turn to adaptive athletics to heal their physical and emotional battle wounds.

programme.title: The Madness of King George (1994)
programme.desc: The 18th-century British monarch (Nigel Hawthorne) loves his devoted queen (Helen Mirren) but illness dramatically affects his mind.

programme.title: Teen Wolf Too (1987)
programme.desc: Showing signs of a dormant family trait, a college freshman (Jason Bateman) becomes a big werewolf on campus.

programme.title: Sidewalks of New York (2001)
programme.desc: A television producer (Edward Burns), a teacher (Rosario Dawson), a musician, a waitress, a dentist and a real estate agent deal with rocky romances.

programme.title: Gung Ho (1986)
